answers.answer: I would call your renal specialist if you have kidney problems dear. You may have a kidney infection. They hurt up the side of your back. It's important to get that taken care of right away. I'm wondering if the brown urine you are talking about is old blood. I'm really not sure but it's the first thing that comes to mind besides your kidney problems. Either way I wouldnt take any chances. Best of luck to you!Ginger

question: what does brown urine mean? I have back pain & urgency to urinate. & my urine is brown I am 3rd stage I had some bleeding 3 days ago & then pressure back pain cannot go a lot but go often. I have been 3rd stage for about 10 yrs. I am 70 yrs old have a splenic aneurysmn, copd hypertension diabetes. My kidneys have been about 60%
title: uti or infection of some kind
